summary: Feature request for implementing Nexus support in the TypeScript SDK alongside the generic Nexus TypeScript SDK. The team is actively working on this integration with ongoing work tracked in the nexus-rpc/sdk-typescript repository.
userImpact: Users cannot use Nexus for RPC-style async operations in TypeScript applications until this feature is implemented.
proposedFix: Implement Temporal-specific Nexus support in the TypeScript SDK, coordinating with the nexus-rpc/sdk-typescript repository development and PR #1708.
resolutionDetails: Feature was implemented through active development work on PR #1708 and coordination with the nexus-rpc/sdk-typescript repository.
keyQuote: We're actively working on this. You can keep an eye on ongoing work on the nexus-rpc/sdk-typescript repository, as well as PR #1708.
